definition.name: Autosquash
definition.description: Automatically update PRs with outdated checks and squash and merge the ones matching all branch protections.
definition.author: Thibault Derousseaux <tibdex@gmail.com>

inputs.name: label
inputs.description: Name of the label used by Autosquash to find the pull requests to handle.

evidence.reasoning: The action automates the process of updating pull requests and squashing them, which relates to code quality and testing by ensuring that outdated checks are handled. However, it does not fit neatly into the other established categories.
